entry.title: 3M Weatherban 5354-1/4X1/8X25 - Weatherban Sealant Tape 5354 Black 1/4 Inch x 25 ft 7000121508
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Sealant Tape
Price: 15.21

[shortdesc]

3M Weatherban Sealant Tape, 5354, black, 1/4 in x 25 ft roll

  • 3M™ Weatherban™ Sealant Tape 5354 is a black, aggressively tacky, solid extrusion with exceptional cold flow resistance and low moisture vapour transmission.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Weatherban
    Color Black
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Sealant Tape

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Weatherban™ Sealant Tape 5354 is ideal for many sealing applications between glass and metal
  • Also adheres to EPDM rubber.

    • Product Information

  • High tack butyl tape
  • Permanently tacky adhesive
  • Weather resistant
  • Window, door, transportation and general industrial
  • Tacking, gasketing, bonding, sticking, adhering, taping, weather proofing and sealing

entry.title: 3M 8067-4X75 - All Weather Flashing Tape 8067 Tan 4 Inch x 75 ft Slit Liner 7000001346
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Flashing Tapes
Price: 47.99

[shortdesc]

3M All Weather Flashing Tape, 8067, tan, 4 in x 75 ft, slit liner

  • 3M™ All Weather Flashing Tape 8067 is a self-adhesive barrier for use in the construction industry to seal window and door openings against moisture intrusion.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Adhesive Type Acrylic
    Application Flashing Windows & Doors
    Color Tan
    Length 75 ft
    Width 4 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Flashing Tapes

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ All Weather Flashing Tape 8067 is a self-adhered, waterproof flashing membrane designed for sealing around openings and penetrations in exterior walls
  • This product has an acrylic pressure sensitive adhesive that aggressively sticks and stays stuck bo

    • Product Information

  • Offers 0°F (-17.8°C) to 120°F (65.6°C) application temperature range
  • High tack adhesive sticks and stays stuck to most common building materials
  • Resists UV exposure for up to six months
  • No adhesive melting or staining in summer heat
  • Very low vapour transmission rate

    • Suggested Application

  • Adhesive provides an unusual combination of both cold temperature and hot temperature adhesion to most substrates, which can extend the construction season in many climates
  • Tough backing resists punctures and tears during application and is uniquely desig
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch 2210-4X10 - Vinyl Mastic Roll 2210 in Black (4 Inch x 10 ft) 7000026559
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Weatherstripping
Price: 77.92

[shortdesc]

Scotch Vinyl Mastic Roll, 2210, black, 90 mil (2.3 mm), 4 in x 10 ft (100 mm x 3 m)

  • Scotch® Vinyl Mastic Roll 2210 is a self-fusing, rubber based insulating compound designed to insulate, moisture seal and pad connections up to 600 volts
  • Laminated to a flexible, all-weather grade vinyl backing, the Scotch® Vinyl Mastic Roll 2210 has excellent resistance to abrasion, moisture, and varying weather conditions.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Color Black
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Weatherstripping

    Product Information

  • PVC backing with rubber mastic
  • Flexible over a wide range of temperatures
  • Highly resistant to ultraviolet rays
  • Easily installed to provide maximum protection
  • Compatible with all common dielectric cable insulation
  • Compatible with all common dielectric cable insulation

    • Suggested Application

  • Great for bolted connections, service drops, traffic signal wire connections, lightening connections, transformer bushing protection and more
  • For indoor and outdoor applications

entry.title: 3M Windo-Weld 8609 - Super Fast Urethane - 10.5 fl. oz. (310 ml) 7000028403
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Weatherstripping
Price: 27.48

[shortdesc]

3M Windo-Weld Super Fast Urethane, 08609, 10.5 fl. oz. (310 ml)

  • 3M™ Windo-Weld Super Fast Urethane, 08609, is a medium viscosity, single component , moisture curing urethane adhesive
  • This product bonds auto replacement glass to car bodies
  • The thick bond line may allow some non-structural body panel applications.

entry.title: 3M Windo-Weld 8620 - Round Ribbon Sealer (1/4 Inch x 15 ft) 7000046614
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Weatherstripping
Price: 9.49

[shortdesc]

3M Windo-Weld Round Ribbon Sealer, 08620, 1/4 in x 15 ft (0.63 cm x 4.5 m) roll

  • 3M™ Windo-Weld Round Ribbon Sealer, 08620, offers controlled compressibility which allows for easy installation yet will not squeeze out or allow light to contact pinchweld
  • There is sufficient material to replace one windshield or backlight.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Windo-Weld
    Length 15 ft
    Width 1/4 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Weatherstripping

    Product Information

  • Excellent adhesion over temperature range 20°F - 120°F (-6.6°C - 48.9°C)
  • Aggressive tack provides immediate bonding
  • Excellent water seal
  • Compatible with urethane, polysulfide and butyl sealants

    • Suggested Application

  • Use as a supplementary sealant when installing stationary glass with urethane adhesive
  • For installation of stationary glass when used as supplementary sealer/bonding material with urethane adhesive
    		•
